stability.unstable: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (core_intrinsics)intrinsics are unlikely to ever be stabilized, instead they should be used through stabilized interfaces in the rest of the standard library

apiDescription: Equivalent to the appropriate llvm.memcpy.p0i8.0i8.* intrinsic, with a size of count * size_of::<T>() and an alignment of min_align_of::<T>()
The volatile parameter is set to true, so it will not be optimized out unless size is equal to zero.
